download.fileDownloadClick: If the download doesn't start click {url}

upload.dragFiles: Drag files here or click to select files
upload.fileSavedMessage: Your file was successfully saved. Use the following code to download it:
upload.uploadSizeExceeds: Upload size exceeds the limit. Please contact a team member.

share.shareTitle: Someone quickdropped a file to you!
share.shareText: Use the following link to download the file:
share.shareNotSupported: Sharing is not supported on this browser.

report.reportRawText: Ensuring our platform remains free of illegal content is a top priority for us. You can report content using the form below or by emailing {mail}.
report.invalidCode: Make sure to enter a valid downlaod code

mailTemplate.subject: Report of Download Code: {code}
mailTemplate.body: To Whom It May Concern,%0DI hope this message finds you well. I am writing to report a download code associated with a file on your platform.%0D %3Cb%3EDownload Code: {code}%3C%2Fb%3E%0D %3Cb%3EReason for Reporting: {reason}%3C%2Fb%3E%0DPlease investigate this matter at your earliest convenience. If you require any additional information, feel free to contact me.%0DThank you for your attention to this issue.%0DBest regards,%0DYOUR NAME

general.preserveFilesDescription: By default files are kept for {defaultDuration} hours
